original_text: However, let each one of you love his wife as himself, and let the wife see that she respects her husband.
korean_text: 그러나 너희도 각각 자기의 아내 사랑하기를 자신 같이 하고 아내도 자기 남편을 존경하라

sentences.original_text: let each one of you love his wife as himself,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각 사람은 자기 아내를 자기 자신처럼 사랑하라

sentences.original_text: let the wife see that she respects her husband.
